H0.text: Nebuchadnezzar was the ruler of which ancient kingdom (606-562 BC). Assyria

H1.text: Nebuchadnezzar was the ruler of which ancient kingdom (606-562 BC). Phoenicia

H2.text: Nebuchadnezzar was the ruler of which ancient kingdom (606-562 BC). Lydia

H3.text: Nebuchadnezzar was the ruler of which ancient kingdom (606-562 BC). Babilu

A4.text: Nebuchadnezzar was the second king of the Neo-Babylonian Empire, ruling from 605 BC to 562 BC.

A5.text: violet: The Neo-Babylonian Empire succeeded the Neo-Assyrian Empire as a dominant power in the region.
